serviceName: CertDashboard Site A and TXT ssl records
description: Enable domain to work with the CertDashboard by configuring the necessary A ,CNAME and TXT SSL records.
variableDescription: ARecordHost: A Record host ,ARecordIP: refers to the IP address provided by the user, cdHostname: cert dashboard host name, txtCdValue: cert dashboard txt value, CNameRecordHost : cname host , CNameRecordIP : ip provided by user, MxRecordHost : mx record host name, MxRecordDomain : max record domain provided by user, NSRecordHost : host provided by user, NSRecordDomain : domain provided by user, AAAARecordHost: record host provided by user, AAAARecordHostIP6: ip6 for the record.
